channel.title: Timers help!
channel.description:
Can someone help me make a timer to do a ::kickall command and tradeduel to = false after 59 minutes... Since my auto restarter is every 1 hour = 60 minutes it deletes a lot of peoples items because my autosave is every 1 seconds and they get kicked in middle of a trade usually. I pretty much need to know where to put the code because I know how to make the timer but I don't know where to put it to be accurate because I put it in the wrong place and it gets brought up every 500ms....
Thanks!!!
Please help me and don't post useless posts like "Why do you use a restarter" etc...

item.title: Timers help!
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

k, i got the void for kickall in the playerhandler (goes under public void process in playerhandler.java)

if (kickAllPlayers == true) { int kickID = 1; do { if (players[kickID] != null) { players[kickID].isKicked = true; } kickID++; } while (kickID < maxPlayers); kickAllPlayers = false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Timers help!
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

[quote=“R4ND0M, post:2, topic:178927”]for the kickall command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall") && (playerRights >= 2)) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }

im going to try to help for the rest of your problems… its me, Mr Random from your server![/quote]

you need to make a void for that.

Read full topic

item.title: Timers help!
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

for the kickall command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall") && (playerRights >= 2)) { PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }

EDIT: ok, i think i got the timer down…
go to server.java, and where it shows all the public static int’s, place this:

public static int tradeTimer = 59;

im not sure whether the units place is minutes or not… you’ll have to find that out… anyways, then search for:

e.printStackTrace();

you should see something like…

} catch (Exception e) { misc.println("Error loading settings"); e.printStackTrace(); }

under that last bracket, place this:

if (tradeTimer > 0) { tradeTimer -= .1; customCommand("enabletrade") } else if (tradeTimer == 0) { customCommand("disabletrade"); }

k, then you go to client… and add this to your commands…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("disabletrade") && (playerRights > 3)) { server.trading = false; yell("Trade disabled! Server restart in 1 minute!"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("enabletrade") && (playerRights > 3)) { server.trading = true; server.dueling = true; yell("Trade enabled"); }

i think that will work… and for the timer for kickall, just place it in under the:

if (tradeTimer == 0) {

im going to try to help for the rest of your problems… its me, Mr Random from your server!

Read full topic
